mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ADDR1, MEMBER_ADDR2, MEMBER_AUTH, MEMBER_PHONE ) VALUES ( (select nvl(max(a.member_no),0)+1 from member a), #{MEMBER_NAME}, #{MEMBER_ID}, #{MEMBER_PW}, #{MEMBER_EMAIL}, #{MEMBER_ADDR1}, #{MEMBER_ADDR2}, 'staff', #{MEMBER_PHONE} )
